# Arctic Call (Level 11 Evoker)
## Overview
*Fine vellum sheets fill these two well-worn books. Beautiful illustrations depict the effects of each spell, many with a distinctly arctic theme. Though the pages and their wintry illustrations are of high quality, the protective leather case that encloses both books smells and feels greasy, as if the hide has been crudely waterproofed with animal fat.*

**Protection** *[[Fire Trap (Spell)|fire trap]]* modified to inflict cold damage (Reflex DC 17)

**Opposition Schools** Illusion, necromancy

**Value** 4,305 gp (5,955 gp with the preparation ritual)

**Spells**

6th—*[[Contingency (Spell)|contingency]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Freezing Sphere (Spell)|freezing sphere]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Repulsion (Spell)|repulsion]]*

5th—*[[Cone of Cold (Spell)|cone of cold]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Mage's Private Sanctum (Spell)|mage’s private sanctum]]*, *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]*, *[[Teleport (Spell)|teleport]]*, *[[Wall of Force (Spell)|wall of force]]* <sup>S</sup>

4th—*[[Ice Storm (Spell)|ice storm]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Shout (Spell)|shout]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Stoneskin (Spell)|stoneskin]]*, *[[Symbol of Revelation (Spell)|symbol of revelation]]*, *[[Wall of Ice (Spell)|wall of ice]]* <sup>S</sup>

3rd—*[[Arcane Sight (Spell)|arcane sight]]*, *[[Dispel Magic (Spell)|dispel magic]]*, *[[Elemental Aura (Spell)|elemental aura]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Fire Trap (Spell)|fire trap]]*, *[[Heroism (Spell)|heroism]]*, *[[Lightning Bolt (Spell)|lightning bolt]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Phantom Steed (Spell)|phantom steed]]*, *[[Seek Thoughts (Spell)|seek thoughts]]*

2nd—*[[Bull's Strength (Spell)|bull’s strength]]*, *[[False Life (Spell)|false life]]* <sup>OP</sup>, *[[Glitterdust (Spell)|glitterdust]]*, *[[Hideous Laughter (Spell)|hideous laughter]]*, *[[Make Whole (Spell)|make whole]]*, *[[Resist Energy (Spell)|resist energy]]*, *[[Rope Trick (Spell)|rope trick]]*

1st—*[[Detect Secret Doors (Spell)|detect secret doors]]*, *[[Endure Elements (Spell)|endure elements]]*, *[[Enlarge Person (Spell)|enlarge person]]*, *[[Feather Fall (Spell)|feather fall]]*, *[[Mage Armor (Spell)|mage armor]]*, *[[Magic Missile (Spell)|magic missile]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Obscuring Mist (Spell)|obscuring mist]]*, *[[Shield (Spell)|shield]]*, *[[Shocking Grasp (Spell)|shocking grasp]]* <sup>S</sup>

0—standard plus *breeze*

**Preparation Ritual**

**Rime Bite (Su)** You infuse your spell with a biting cold that few can withstand. Spend this boon as a free action when you cast a spell with the cold descriptor. Any damage from that spell ignores all resistance to cold, but does not ignore immunity to cold.

**Source:** Ultimate Magic, pg. 124
